lines:
15 April, 1909.

ür. So Go Lak,

South Byfield, lass.

Dear Sir:

dr. Stearns is away for several days, and therefore cannot reply prompt. 
ly to your istter of the 15th. He will return élther the first on the middle of next 
weak, and will doubtless send to you at that time the money for thion you ask. A 
check came from China a day or two ago, which i Shine was applies to your gemount.

Very truly yourse

Seerstary to the Principale
raw: 15 April, 1909. ür. So Go Lak, South Byfield, lass. Dear Sir: dr. Stearns is away for several days, and therefore cannot reply prompt. ly to your istter of the 15th. He will return élther the first on the middle of next weak, and will doubtless send to you at that time the money for thion you ask. A check came from China a day or two ago, which i Shine was applies to your gemount. Very truly yourse Seerstary to the Principale

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that Stearns is away and cannot reply to the letter of April 15th. The latest check has been received and Stearns will send the money requested upon his return.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
